<NEW>

At this point, DINOBOT and CRYOT=
EK were obviously escorting HYDRAS, and it was unknown to DINOBOT if LEO PR=
IME had managed to detect the two stealthed PREDACON units of VICE GRIP and=
 BLACKARACHNIA.

Pausing then, and taking note of the MAXIMAL AERIAL ESCORT=
S.  While the escort of MAXIMALS was too heavy for a plotted assassination =
attempt, but with communications seemingly down according to what was being=
 said over the area, if the MAXIMAL LEADER LEO PRIME could be split apart f=
rom his escorts, then perhpas he could be overwhelmed..  AT the ver least, =
an amusing thing to contemplate.

Meanwhile, in the trees BLACKARACHNIA kep=
t her myriad optics in her spider mode peeled, glancing up at the aerial Ma=
ximals while she languidly thought about how she could disable thier wingsp=
ans.  But, quite simply they were too BIG for her to take out even from amb=
ush and with luck on her side and cut off from support.  LEO PRIME had chos=
en his backup well, and there would be nos neak strike.

Just what would th=
ey find over out there, and what would they be going after now?  SHe would =
watch and wait carefully before revealing herself.
